programme.title: RAMAYANAM

programme.title: Singapenne

programme.title: News
programme.desc: This news programme chronicles the latest events, developments, inventions, discoveries and happenings around the world.

programme.title: ETHIRNEECHAL THODARGIRADHU
programme.desc: Urged by her father, Janani is always a high achiever. But her marriage into a patriarchal family dashes her dream of a career. Thus begins Janani's arduous journey towards empowering her family's oppressed women to unleash their power.

programme.title: Sevvanthi
programme.desc: Destiny plays a cruel role in Sevanthi's naive and sheltered life with her dream-come-true husband Mano and his extended family. Watch Sevanthi traverse the nuances of family, despite the challenges life throws at her.

programme.title: Poongodi
programme.desc: Poongodi rises above her father's male chauvinism, intent on proving herself & pursuing a college education. Her path crosses with Saravanan, a nave young man who blindly trusts his manipulative stepmother. Uncover the fate of the two kindred souls.

programme.title: Punitha
programme.desc: Maragatham holds her step-daughter Punitha dear, to the point of being overbearing. However, their bond turns twisted & burdened when Punitha finds her soulmate, Kabilan. Amidst family betrayals, can Punitha show her mother the true meaning of love?

programme.title: MANAMAGALE VAA
programme.desc: Narmada's mission to her ancestral village to reunite her father & his estranged family entwines with Kathir's task of finding suitable grooms for his three sisters. What unfolds when they fall in love, striving for a cause against the same enemy?

programme.title: Punnagai Poove
programme.desc: Ever since destiny united Kalaivani with Chezhiyan during childhood, she has been thinking of him as her prince charming. Will her hopes of a fairy tale life prevail against the odds and hurdles she is about to encounter?

programme.title: PUTHU VASANTHAM
programme.desc: Raised as a single child, Selvi longs for the loving embrace & heart-warming bond of a joint family. And when her dream comes true, watch her battle all odds & win over her husband's large family.

programme.title: ilakkiya
programme.desc: Bold and beautiful Ilakkiya finds happiness in making others happy. Circumstance leads to her tying the knot with her friend Gautham. Can Ilakkiya create her destiny, despite Gautham's controlling aunt Bairavi & her conniving cousin Anjali?

programme.title: LAKSHMI
programme.desc: Maha, her familys financial backbone, marries Selvam, on condition that she will continue to support her family financially even after marriage. Post which they confront challenges that put the familys peace and happiness to test.

programme.title: ANANDA RAGAM
programme.desc: Unfortunate events force an ambitious Eashwari and a school dropout Azhagar to tie the knot. Can this odd couple turn their marriage into a happily ever after? Will Eashwari realize her IPS dream amidst life's many hardships?

programme.title: Des Racines & Des Ailes - EP 3
programme.desc: Whether summer or winter, Savoie is always a land of excellence. We meet Fombonne-Rouvier, town planner; Rene and Maxime Meilleur, chefs at a three Michelin-starred restaurant; Klebert Silvestre, bee-keeper, Nicolas Mathieu, crozet-producer and mountain guide; Pascale Vidonne, in charge of heritage in Bourg-Saint-Maurice, notably responsible for its Baroque chapels.

programme.title: L'absente - EP 3
programme.desc: Alex/Marina discovers the joy of having a family and a loving mother, making her little sister eleonore very jealous. She decides to become Marina for good and breaks off with Mael, the friend she'd been through so much with. But Laurent thinks she's lying and secretly requests another DNA test...

programme.title: L'absente - EP 4
programme.desc: An anonymous writer threatens to denounce Alex/Marina if she doesn't obey his orders. eleonore has a new boyfriend: Mael, who has hidden his real identity from her. The police discover that Ivan Claes was innocent. Marina's murderer is manipulating them from the shadows, close nearby.

programme.title: Terra Artistika - EP 3
programme.desc: Encounter with Julien des Monstiers both in his studio at the Chateau de Chambord and at a magisterial solo exhibition. Dragons and other extraordinary creatures populate a world beyond contemporary conventions.

programme.title: Retour Au Pays - EP 1
programme.desc: Having left for Thailand alone aged 23, Mathias returns to Switzerland with his family. After living in Switzerland for over twenty years, Lia dreams of returning to Cuba. Finally, a young member of the Swiss Guard puts an end to his commitment to the Vatican and return home on horseback.

programme.title: Terra Artistika - EP 2
programme.desc: The sculptures created by Agnes Baillon, almost always women, capture our gaze for an exchange steeped in humanity. From Parisian workshop to art gallery, scenes from everyday life displayed free of artifice but rich in nuance.

programme.desc: In Quebec, Corey and Evelyne accompany a mother of three, all teenagers, who's looking for a house where everyone can have their own bedroom in a district that offers a wide range of activities. So which will she prefer: Beauport of Saint-emile?

programme.title: Un Si Grand Soleil - EP 1584

programme.title: Une Brique Dans Le Ventre
programme.desc: In addition to the houses, apartments and lofts of various styles and prices which Cedric Wautier shows us through his many visits, this programme about homes offers legal, practical, technical, energy and aesthetic advice, without forgetting the part about the all-important DIY ''tricks''.

programme.title: Atiku, Gardien Du Territoire
programme.desc: Jean-Luc Kanape, Innu de Pessamit, leads us on the tracks of the last herds of woodland caribou in the vast Pipmuacan territory. This former hunter is committed to protecting the species, which is threatened with extinction if no changes are made.

programme.title: 6h Info
programme.desc: The 6am news bulletin (Paris time) by the France Televisions editorial team.

programme.title: Telematin
programme.desc: The latest news and laughter, 7 days a week With Flavie Flament and Julien Arnaud on weekdays, Maya Lauque and Damien Thevenot at weekends.

programme.title: Salle Des Profs - EP 34
programme.desc: A humorous look at working conditions for teachers through the trials and tribulations of five colleagues, unlike any others you've met.

programme.title: Telematin
programme.desc: The latest news and laughter, 7 days a week With Flavie Flament and Julien Arnaud on weekdays, Maya Lauque and Damien Thevenot at weekends.

programme.title: Le Gout Des Rencontres En Nouvelle-Aquitaine - EP 6
programme.desc: Exploring rural land and culinary traditions! Chef Justine Piluso criss-crosses Nouvelle-Aquitaine to meet men and women in the region to learn about their products, their tastes and the dishes that they prepare.

programme.title: Slam
programme.desc: Three contestants compete in a game of arrow crosswords, trying to complete the grids by finding the answers to the definitions provided. But to have access to those definitions, they first need to answer questions that all share one common characteristic: the response is always a letter.

programme.title: Le Telejournal De Radio-Canada
programme.desc: The televised news programme from the Radio-Canada team.

programme.title: Quartier Recherche - EP 10

programme.title: Rocky & Lily : C'est Dans La Boite ! - EP 43
programme.desc: Each day, Rocky and Lily receive a new box in the studio. But what's inside? One thing is certain, it's bound to contain a surprise that will lead them to discover a host of very different subjects: from guitars to trolls and even how to sort your waste for recycling!

programme.title: Edmond Et Lucy - EP 5
programme.desc: Edmond the squirrel and Lucy the bear cub grew up together. They live in a majestic chestnut tree in the heart of the forest. With their friends they solve riddles and live thrilling adventures, with every day bringing new wonders to discover in the natural world around them.

programme.title: Les Super-Pouvoirs Du Vivant - EP 11
programme.desc: The animal kingdom is brimming with creatures that have extraordinary powers. To reveal the incredible inventiveness of nature and the importance of protecting it, each episode takes us on a fascinating journey rich in poetry and humour.

programme.title: Foot Go - EP 17
programme.desc: Eight year-old Tata arrives in a new school. She wants to join its football team but isn't allowed to; after all she's a girl! Refusing to be beaten, Tata decides to set up her own girls' team with the help of her gang of friends.

programme.title: Alix Et Les Merveilleux - EP 50
programme.desc: Alix wants to take part in the sports competitions in the forest, but the only opponent in all her events is none other than Big Boss, and that means a big battle!

programme.title: Le Gout Des Rencontres En Nouvelle-Aquitaine - EP 6

programme.title: Les Tribulations D'un Chinois En Chine
programme.desc: Jaded young millionaire Arthur wants to kill himself. Mr Goh, an old friend, suggests he take out a life insurance policy in his name. He will take care of his death. Arthur accepts but then finds love and rediscovers a taste for life. But Mr Goh's killers are after him.

programme.title: Fausse Route
programme.desc: Roxane is exhausted. Even the shortest car journey with her partner and six-month old baby now becomes a nightmare. She feels she's suffocating...

programme.title: Une Autre Histoire - EP 2
programme.desc: Anemone reflects on the best way to announce her diagnosis to her children. She also ends up plunging back into past memories: in leaving her physically abusive husband, she also left behind three children... Should she get in touch with them?

programme.title: Une Autre Histoire - EP 3
programme.desc: Anemone organises a dinner with the aim of announcing her diagnosis to her children. Sophie becomes closer to Naelle, Simon's wife. Should he be concerned? Caroline welcomes her daughters to her new home for the first time, whilst Sebastien meets up with a former lover.

programme.title: L'etabli
programme.desc: 1968. Robert, graduated from ecole Normale Superieur and extreme left militant, is hired by Citroen as assembly line worker to revive the revolutionary fire. When the company requires workers to work three hours overtime per week for no pay, Robert and some others see the opportunity for a social movement.

programme.desc: The Monastery of the Augustinian Sisters has been redesigned as a hotel complex focusing on harmony between the old and the new. At the Verdun Auditorium, the new arena perfectly sits side by side with the 1938 Art Deco wing and the beautiful EcoRad radiators.

programme.title: Proches De Detenus, Une Autre Peine
programme.desc: Being confronted with having a family member in prison is always difficult, particularly for children. Prisoners' families, around 50,000 people in Switzerland, feel as if they are sharing the sentence and with few organisations offering support coping is even harder. Their personal stories come across as a cry for help.

programme.title: 6h Info
programme.desc: The 6am news bulletin (Paris time) by the France Televisions editorial team.

programme.title: Telematin
programme.desc: The latest news and laughter, 7 days a week With Flavie Flament and Julien Arnaud on weekdays, Maya Lauque and Damien Thevenot at weekends.

programme.title: Salle Des Profs - EP 34
programme.desc: A humorous look at working conditions for teachers through the trials and tribulations of five colleagues, unlike any others you've met.

programme.title: Telematin
programme.desc: The latest news and laughter, 7 days a week With Flavie Flament and Julien Arnaud on weekdays, Maya Lauque and Damien Thevenot at weekends.

programme.title: La Cuisine D'isabelle Et Ricardo - EP 11
programme.desc: Isabelle shows how to save time by using off-the-shelf sauces from the supermarket for a fried rice recipe and a rice noodle salad with cabbage.

programme.title: Slam
programme.desc: Three contestants compete in a game of arrow crosswords, trying to complete the grids by finding the answers to the definitions provided. But to have access to those definitions, they first need to answer questions that all share one common characteristic: the response is always a letter.

programme.title: Le Telejournal De Radio-Canada
programme.desc: The televised news programme from the Radio-Canada team.

programme.title: Bien Bati - EP 4
programme.desc: The Monastery of the Augustinian Sisters has been redesigned as a hotel complex focusing on harmony between the old and the new. At the Verdun Auditorium, the new arena perfectly sits side by side with the 1938 Art Deco wing and the beautiful EcoRad radiators.

programme.title: Ligue 1 Mcdonald's - Avant-Matchs
programme.desc: Presenting the next day of the French football championship.

programme.title: Rocky & Lily : C'est Dans La Boite ! - EP 44
programme.desc: Each day, Rocky and Lily receive a new box in the studio. But what's inside? One thing is certain, it's bound to contain a surprise that will lead them to discover a host of very different subjects: from guitars to trolls and even how to sort your waste for recycling!

programme.title: Edmond Et Lucy - EP 6
programme.desc: Edmond the squirrel and Lucy the bear cub grew up together. They live in a majestic chestnut tree in the heart of the forest. With their friends they solve riddles and live thrilling adventures, with every day bringing new wonders to discover in the natural world around them.

programme.title: Les Super-Pouvoirs Du Vivant - EP 12
programme.desc: The animal kingdom is brimming with creatures that have extraordinary powers. To reveal the incredible inventiveness of nature and the importance of protecting it, each episode takes us on a fascinating journey rich in poetry and humour.

programme.title: Foot Go - EP 18
programme.desc: Eight year-old Tata arrives in a new school. She wants to join its football team but isn't allowed to; after all she's a girl! Refusing to be beaten, Tata decides to set up her own girls' team with the help of her gang of friends.

programme.title: Alix Et Les Merveilleux - EP 51
programme.desc: Alix notices that Hatter feels a bit overwhelmed by Chief who is constantly calling on him without warning, at any time of the day and night. But in trying to reduce his visits, Alix comes to realise that Chief is himself a victim of that queen of space-invaders: Big Boss.

programme.title: La Cuisine D'isabelle Et Ricardo - EP 11
programme.desc: Isabelle shows how to save time by using off-the-shelf sauces from the supermarket for a fried rice recipe and a rice noodle salad with cabbage.

programme.title: Un Si Grand Soleil - EP 1586
programme.desc: The Bastide, Estrela, Salama, Levy, Berville and Alami families, plus a host of supporting characters, live and work in the modern everyday city of Montpellier, in southern France. Between romance and crime thriller, with a blend of comic and serious themes, their stories weave a fascinating web.

programme.title: Questions Pour Un Champion
programme.desc: A general knowledge quiz.

programme.title: Tv5 Monde, Le Journal
programme.desc: All the national and international news from the TV5MONDE news staff.

programme.title: L'absente - EP 5
programme.desc: Helene admits that eleven years earlier, Marina had run away after surprising her with her lover. And that was when she was kidnapped. Superintendent Victoire Eberhart discovers that the man who has been pulling the strings since the beginning is none other than Paul, her lieutenant and Laurent's best friend.

programme.title: L'absente - EP 6
programme.desc: In Ivan Claes' trunk, Laurent discovers a bloody towel and Marina's bracelet. He gives them to Paul for analysis, but the latter burns them. Laurent drags him into the forest, ready to kill him if he won't tell him where his daughter is buried. But Paul isn't the murderer...

programme.title: Y'a Pas De Planete B - EP 7
programme.desc: What are the greatest risks to health? How can we avoid them? The doctor-epidemiologist Jean-David Zeitoun brings us the answers and three concrete commonplace examples with the air we breathe, food and cosmetic products.

programme.title: Movie - Vetri Kodi Kattu
programme.desc: Two men are duped by a conman who promises to give them visas to fly to Dubai. Realising that their families might get hurt, they decide to exchange their addresses and help each other's family.

programme.title: Movie - My Dear Kutti Chathan
programme.desc: A black magician creates a little boy with magical powers to use for his con jobs. The boy becomes friends with three kids. Complications arise when the magician wants the boy to steal a treasure.

programme.title: Movie - Piragu
programme.desc: Sathya, who comes to Chennai to be a film director, ends up being targeted by two rival gangs, whose leaders have enough reason to kill him. Now, Sathya must gather his courage and fight his enemies.

programme.title: Movie - Pirappu
programme.desc: Karthika falls in love with Prabha, Sharanya and Mahadevan's adopted son. Prabha, however, loves Mayura, which upsets Karthika. On seeing her heartbroken, Karthika's father kills Prabha's parents.

programme.title: Movie - Pattalam
programme.desc: Two rival groups of adolescents from Holy Bells School engage in occasional tiffs. An unfortunate incident takes place before an athletics tournament which consequently changes their perception.

programme.title: Movie - Sethu
programme.desc: A violent college student softens his tough exterior when he falls in love with a shy Brahmin woman. However, tragedy strikes when he suffers a serious brain injury in a brutal fight.

programme.title: Movie - Bheesma
programme.desc: A wise-cracking meme creator gets the chance to prove himself to the girl he loves when he is suddenly appointed to be the CEO of her workplace.

programme.title: Movie - Citizen
programme.desc: Abdulla, a mechanic, kidnaps three prominent government officials. Sarojini is a CBI officer who investigates this matter and tries to piece together the clues left behind by the kidnapper.

programme.title: Movie - Manadhai Thirudivittai
programme.desc: A student's life takes a drastic turn when he is about to marry the love of his life.

programme.title: Movie - Pokkri Thambi
programme.desc: Pokkiri Thambi is a 1992 Indian Tamil thriller film directed by Senthilnathan. The film features Anandaraj and Kaveri in lead roles, with Vijayakumar, Janagaraj, Jayanthkumar, Balambika, Kumarimuthu, and King Kong playing supporting roles.

programme.title: Movie - Ponnu Orukku Pudhusu
programme.desc: Ponnu Oorukku Pudhusu is a 1979 Indian Tamil movie. The cast and crew of Ponnu Oorukku Pudhusu includes Sudhakar, Saritha, Vijayan, as well as director R. Selvaraj, and music composer Ilayaraja.

programme.title: Movie - Vanakkamda Mapplae
programme.desc: Mariner Aravind enjoys a happy-go-lucky life with six months at sea and six months on land. He falls in love with Thulasi. Eventually love blossoms between them, but trouble begins when Aravind's silly mistake from the past catches up with him.

programme.title: Movie - Hello Naan Pei Peasuran
programme.desc: A small-time hustler (Vaibhav) gets a mysterious call from an angry ghost on his mobile phone. He and his buddies must get rid of the ghost before it's too late.

programme.title: Movie - Alaipayuthe
programme.desc: Karthik and Shakti marry against the wishes of their families and start their new life. However, they soon realise that marriage is not the bed of roses they had imagined it would be.

programme.title: Moive - Kalaba Kadhalan
programme.desc: Kanmani, who stays at her sister's house, ends up falling in love with her sister's husband and tries to romance him at any given chance. However, he plans on getting her married to his cousin.

programme.title: Movie - Kaavalan
programme.desc: Bhoomi highly respects Muthuramalingam and his daughter Meera. While appointed as Meera's bodyguard, he falls in love with a girl he has never met, unaware that she is none other than Meera.

Each episode features a dedicated theme such as equality, maternity, leadership, mental health, fan engagement, activism and more, supported by exclusive interviews with leaders at the forefront of womens sport.

programme.title: Billie Jean King Cup Qualifiers 2025 Group B: Czechia vs Brazil
programme.desc: The 2025 Billie Jean King Cup Qualifiers are being played as 6 groups of 3 nations as the Billie Jean King Cup Finals transit from a 12-team event to an 8 team event in 2025, mirroring the existing Davis Cup Final 8 format. Each 3 day qualifiers group event will be held in one location and played on a round-robin basis. The 6 group winners will join hosts China, and 2024 world champions Italy in the 2025 Finals in Shenzhen.

programme.title: ASO Cycling Programming 2025
programme.desc: The Volta a Catalunya is a road bicycle race held annually in Catalonia, Spain. It is one of three World Tour stage races in Spain, together with the Vuelta a Espaa and the Tour of the Basque Country. Raced over seven days, it covers the autonomous community of Catalonia in Northeast Spain and contains one or more stages in the mountain region of the Pyrenees. First held in 1911, the Volta a Catalunya is the fourth-oldest still-existing cycling stage race in the world.

It is a tournament organized by governing body Badminton Asia to crown the best badminton players in Asia. The tournament started in 1962 and is held annually since 1991.

programme.title: PGA Tour 2025
programme.desc: The Corales Puntacana Championship is a golf tournament in the Dominican Republic on the PGA Tour. The inaugural event in 2016 was held in early June, then moved to early May in 2017. The first PGA Tour event held in the Dominican Republic, it is similar in rewards to other alternate events: 300 FedEx Cup points for the winner, a two-year tour exemption but no invitation to the Masters Tournament. 120 professional players will compete for the prize purse of USD4 million.

programme.title: PL STORIES - EP 46
programme.desc: We take a look at the career of Philippe Coutinho, tracing his journey from a promising young talent to one of the Premier League's most skilful and dynamic players. We join Coutinho at his current club Vasco da Gama and reflect on his time in Europe, from his rise at Liverpool to his time at Barcelona, Bayern Munich and Aston Villa. Delving into his passion, creativity, and legacy, we celebrate how his flair and vision have left a lasting mark on the Premier League.

programme.desc: A relationship steeped in glory, Chelsea Football Club is the Italian Job. Last summer, Enzo Maresca became the seventh manager from that heritage to take charge at Stamford Bridge. programme.title: PL STORIES - EP 6
programme.desc: Nicknamed 'The Entertainers', Kevin Keegan's Newcastle team of the 1995-96 season set the Premier League alight with their confidence and flair that took them agonisingly close to winning their first Premier League title. In this show, we speak to those that were part of that incredible journey and reflect on some of those unforgettable moments that captured hearts and forever changing the club's legacy.

programme.desc: PL Stories takes a look at the forgotten moments that truly defined a Premier League season, offering new perspectives on the games that shaped title races. programme.desc: It was the goal that made the footballing world stand up and take notice of Mikel Merino. In scoring the winner for Spain in the semi-finals of Euro 2024, his celebration paid homage to his father, who performed the same iconic dance in the exact same stadium 33 years previously.

programme.title: THE ART OF... - EP 5
programme.desc: The Art Of Recruitment provides a unique insight into how Premier League clubs sign players to achieve their ambitions. programme.title: PL STORIES - EP 42
programme.desc: In this PL Stories show, Tim Howard, who has neurodiverse conditions, leads a conversation with past and present players, exploring the challenges and strengths of living with neurodiversity. Through personal stories, including those of Joao Gomes (stutter), Steven Naismith (dyslexia), Greg Halford (autism), and Charlie Austin (ADHD), the show celebrates resilience and the positive impact neurodiverse traits bring to the football world.

programme.title: FS MMA Nick Thompson vs. Davion Peterson
programme.desc: BodogFIGHT features classic MMA matches involving some of your favorite fighters! BodogFight former welterweight champion Nick Thompson looks to send Davion Peterson into submission in Costa Rica.

programme.title: MEGA Fights Nate Campbell vs. Ali Funeka
programme.desc: MEGA Fights are premiere events from the sport of boxing including HBO World Championship Boxing and historic PPV events plus past, current and future World Champions. This episode features lightweights Nate Campbell, aka 'The Galaxy Warrior', (32-1, 25 KOs) vs. Ali 'Rush Hour' Funeka (30-1, 25 KOs) from the BankAtlantic Center in Sunrise, Florida, USA, on February 14, 2009 in a bout viewed on television by 1.2 million.

programme.title: Wide World of Fights Juan Manuel Marquez vs. Juan Diaz
programme.desc: This episode features a lightweight title bout between Juan Manuel Marquez and Juan Diaz, as well as kickboxing, sumo and more!

programme.title: World Karate Federation
programme.desc: The highest level of competition in the sport of karate anywhere in the world will take place from Budapest, Hungary, as the WKF SENIOR WORLD CHAMPIONSHIPS take place. The top competitors from across the globe, from six different continents, will all converge on Budapest to stake their claim as the best in the world. Don't miss the WKF SENIOR WORLD CHAMPIONSHIPS, only on FIGHT SPORTS.

programme.title: KNOCKOUTS! Amir Khan vs. Marcos Maidana
programme.desc: The main event in this episode is Amir Khan defending the WBA light welterweight title against Marcos Maidana in a bout that earned 2010 Fight of the Year honors from the Boxing Writers Association of America. Also on the card, a young Adrien Broner showcases his skills.

programme.title: FS Grand Sumo
programme.desc: Top ranked sumo competitors in the world are featured in an action packed series, FIGHT SPORTS GRAND SUMO. This new format presents Sumo in an authentic, in-depth and entertaining way covering the rules, ranks, match-ups, and more. Show 1 features Hakuho, Endo, Okinoumi and Yutakayamai from the Osaka Prefectural Gymnasium, in Osaka, Japan.

programme.title: Macho: The Hector Camacho Story
programme.desc: This series takes a hard-hitting look at the rise, fall and untimely death of one of boxing's most colorful champions. Hector Camacho's dynamic speed, footwork and power made him a fighter to be reckoned with, but it was his flamboyance and showmanship that ushered in a new era in boxing. The series chronicles his epic battles inside the ring, his struggles with addiction outside of it and the mystery of the double homicide that claimed his life.

programme.title: Tuesday Night Fights Hector Camacho vs. Luis Maysonet
programme.desc: FIGHT SPORTS revisits some of Hector Camacho's best fights from the legendary USA's Tuesday Night Fights series alongside our new documentary series Macho: The Hector Camacho Story. In this episode Hector "Macho" Camacho (48-3 22 KO 150 lbs) looks to continue his winning streak against Luis Maysonet (28-5 28 KO) in a 10-round contest from Foxwoods Resort Mashantucket CT USA.

programme.title: FS MMA Nick Thompson vs. Davion Peterson
programme.desc: BodogFIGHT features classic MMA matches involving some of your favorite fighters! BodogFight former welterweight champion Nick Thompson looks to send Davion Peterson into submission in Costa Rica.

Using his wwwbook to follow all the clues from polishing day at the Fairy Castle to Fairy Coco swapping the polish for a ribbon, Noddy works out it was Pat-Pat who tried to delay her show.

programme.title: Team Zenko Go S1 - EP 18

programme.title: History's Greatest Mysteries (S4) - EP 23
programme.desc: The history books say Adolf Hitler committed suicide in the final days of World War II, but not everyone believes there's sufficient proof. Did the Nazi leader die in Berlin, or was he able to escape?

programme.title: Pawn Stars (S24) - EP 618
programme.desc: Rick sees red when a Rolex Submariner hits the counter. Will his offer make a splash, or is it just a waste of time? Meanwhile, Corey gets slap happy over a hockey stick signed by Paul Newman.

programme.title: History's Greatest Heists With Pierce Brosnan (S1) - EP 7
programme.desc: Two thieves dressed as fake cops make off with a half-billion dollars' worth of world-class artwork from a Boston museum. Although the paintings remain missing, numerous suspects turn up dead.

programme.title: Ancient Aliens (S15) - EP 235
programme.desc: Around the world and throughout history, people have reported seeing very similar types of unidentified objects in the sky. Now, Ancient Aliens is counting down the top ten alien craft.

programme.title: The UnXplained With William Shatner (S3) - EP 32
programme.desc: For centuries archaeologists have been obsessed with locating ancient cities lost to time. How does a once-thriving community become a lost city? And if they are found, what secrets they might reveal?

programme.title: The Secret Of Skinwalker Ranch (S5) - EP 6
programme.desc: As the team begins drilling in the Mesa, where a massive, possibly metallic object is buried, they have a startling encounter.

programme.title: How Disney Built America - EP 3
programme.desc: Walt Disney overcomes immense obstacles to create the first theme park, where instead of thrill rides, he gives the visitor an immersive journey into a story, like the experience of being inside a movie.

programme.title: The UnBelievable With Dan Aykroyd (S1) - EP 8
programme.desc: Monkey glands for immortality, hypnotised assassins, and a brain-linked cyborg couple. We investigate some of the strangest experiments on record. From two-headed dogs to testicle transplants...

programme.title: How Disney Built America - EP 4
programme.desc: Amidst financial troubles, Disney hires an ingenious marketing whiz who helps them figure out how to bring their beloved characters off the screen and into the hands of millions.

programme.title: History's Greatest Mysteries (S3) - EP 5
programme.desc: A powerful union activist disappears from a Detroit suburb. The mystery of Jimmy Hoffa's disappearance features more twists and turns than a Hollywood movie.

programme.title: Paranormal: Caught On Camera (S3) - EP 22
programme.desc: A paranormal investigative team is stunned by an unsettling capture on their thermal imaging camera. A mother and daughter are profoundly moved by a particularly beautiful UFO sighting.

programme.title: The First 48 (S25) - EP 498
programme.desc: After a 14-year-old boy is shot to death outside of a friend's house, detectives wonder if he was caught in the middle of a sinister plot.

programme.title: The Life & Murder Of Nicole Brown Simpson - EP 2
programme.desc: After years of torment, Nicole files for divorce, embarking on a new chapter that includes a risky affair with one of OJ's close friends. But a failed reconciliation led Nicole to a final, fatal stand.

programme.title: Beyond The Headlines: The Series - EP 4
programme.desc: Tales of toxic love triangles-wives who stray from their husbands with disastrous results, a deadly case of online catfishing, and a lonely young woman who has an affair with a killer.

programme.title: The First 48 (S24) - EP 468
programme.desc: A fateful choice tragically ends the life of an up-and-coming rapper.

programme.title: Panic 9-1-1 (S3) - EP 3

programme.title: Digital Addiction - EP 10
programme.desc: Kerri has an online gambling addiction that is tearing her family apart. Devonte's gaming addiction makes Lisa question his ability to be a good father and husband.

programme.desc: A look at some of the wildest courtroom moments. A bodybuilder tries to bolt from the courtroom; an angry judge hits a handcuffed defendant; a courthouse sucker-puncher; and more.

programme.desc: A look at some of the wildest courtroom moments: A handcuffed defendant attacks her lawyer; a sex offender's mom takes offense at his bail hearing; a judge dresses down a panty thief; and more.

programme.title: Beyond the Headlines: The Tanya Kach Story With Elizabeth Smart
programme.desc: In a revealing conversation, Tanya recounts the horror of the 10 years she spent in captivity in her predator's bedroom, and confides in Elizabeth about the realities of grooming.

programme.title: See No Evil (S6) - EP 19
programme.desc: The murder of an elderly landlady offers no forensic answers. Can detectives piece together her final days using security footage to discover the motive of a vicious killer before they strike again?

programme.title: See No Evil (S6) - EP 20
programme.desc: 15-year-old Sierra LaMar leaves for school like any other day, only to disappear without a trace. Is this just another runaway or did something a lot worse happen to Sierra?

programme.title: Beyond The Headlines: The Gabby Petito Story
programme.desc: This special details the ups and downs of the tragic road trip through the lens of Gabby's social media presence. Told by the people who knew her best and a community of online strangers and cyber sleuths.

programme.title: Anatomy Of A Crime - EP 1
programme.desc: 202 people are killed when three bombs planted by Jemaah Islamiyah terrorists explode at the height of Bali's tourist season.

programme.title: #TextMeWhenYouGetHome (S2) - EP 1
programme.desc: Kelsey's family knew something was amiss when their usually responsible and responsive daughter didn't respond to their texts while out running an errand.

programme.desc: An 11-year-old boy is home alone when a group of robbers breaks into his house. Firefighters plan a dramatic water rescue when a woman's boat gets stuck at the top of a dam.

programme.title: Wild City: Forest Life
programme.desc: Sir David Attenborough narrates the award-winning Wild City series that explores the wild side of Singapore. Here on the fringes of the city, the jungle harbours some fascinating species, including many that have never been filmed before. The star of the show is the Raffles' banded langur, one of the least-known primates on the planet. Found only in Singapore and Malaysia, there are only a few hundred left and around 60 have made a home in Singapore's rainforests.

programme.title: Us Closing Bell
programme.desc: Anything can happen between the bells of the trading day. But what happens during the last hour could be what matters most. Hosted by CNBCs Scott Wapner, "Closing Bell" guides you through the most important hour of the trading day. The show takes a close-up look at how the markets are moving, whats driving them and how investors are reacting.

programme.title: Us Closing Bell: Overtime
programme.desc: When the bell rings, the action does not end. "Closing Bell: Overtime" takes you through all of the after-hours moves including breaking news, corporate earnings and post-market trading. Big investors, smart strategists and top money managers debate actionable ideas and the big market themes of the day, and get viewers ready for tomorrows trading day.

programme.title: Europe Street Signs
programme.desc: One hour into Europes equity session, "Street Signs" provides the street's view and a link to business stories trending online and on social. programme.desc: Headquartered live on the floor of the New York Stock Exchange (NYSE) where the biggest companies in the world trade, "Squawk On The Street" tracks the action of every stock and gives you access to the treasury, currency and commodity action in real time. programme.title: Bloomberg Originals
programme.desc: Powerful stories, revealing conversations and animations to help make sense of the world.

programme.title: Bloomberg Primer S1 - EP 5
programme.desc: Flying cars have largely remained science fiction, until now. A new generation of electrified aircraft is attracting the attention of investors and venture capitalists around the world.

programme.title: Bloomberg Primer S1 - EP 3
programme.desc: Geothermal has been the underdog of the energy industry - but that may be about to change as new startups use fracking technologies to expand potential geothermal sites.

programme.title: Bloomberg Primer S1 - EP 1
programme.desc: Scientists are developing powerful magnets to enable clean energy sources like fusion. But China's dominance of the supply chain for rare-earth magnets threatens their global availability.

programme.title: Bloomberg Primer S1 - EP 2
programme.desc: We explore the world of biocomputing-where scientists are laying the foundation for a field that may blur the lines between the biological and synthetic.

programme.title: An Optimist's Guide to the Planet S1 - EP 1
programme.desc: How do you tell dusk from dawn in the age of climate change? Host Nikolaj Coster-Waldau begins his global journey to find out.

programme.title: An Optimist's Guide to the Planet S1 - EP 2
programme.desc: Shelter is one of humanity's most basic needs. As the global population grows, how can we rethink the way we live to build a more sustainable tomorrow?

programme.title: An Optimist's Guide to the Planet S1 - EP 3
programme.desc: Nature's ability to regenerate existed long before humans inhabited the Earth. What can we learn from its innate ability to help fix the damage we've done?

programme.title: An Optimist's Guide to the Planet S1 - EP 4
programme.desc: In a world where global warming has made food harder to grow, how we plant and harvest are critical issues when it comes to adapting to climate change.

programme.title: An Optimist's Guide to the Planet S1 - EP 5
programme.desc: Nikolaj meets people in Kenya, Switzerland and the US who are working to remove the three big hurdles between us and a true transportation revolution.

programme.title: The Meat And Greed
programme.desc: The food show that is a carnivore's delight, Meat & Greed is back for a sumptuous season 2! Join us on a savoury food crawl as we hunt down the best and tastiest meat dishes Singapore has to offer; sizzling charcoal barbecues, fork tender smoked beef briskets, succulent flamegrilled chicken, crispy whole roast pig, juicy handmade burgers, delectable steamed seafood and much more! In this flavourful protein-packed series, you know you will be getting the lion's share.

programme.title: Eat Around Indonesia
programme.desc: Spices have always been fulfilling most of our land and are the primary charm that makes people came here in droves from hundreds years ago. Within the various taste given by nature, Indonesia grows with many kinds of delicacies.

programme.title: Super Octogenarians
programme.desc: Is 80 the new 50? Super Octogenarians track down some spunky seniors who are working way past their retirement age, and redefining the notion of active ageing. We travel across Asia to witness how these gutsy seniors are debunking the stock images we have of the old, and inspiring all with the tremendous energy they put into their extended professional lives.

programme.title: The Night Shift
programme.desc: A documentary program that discusses about people working at night day. What do they do, why they chose the job, as well how they deal with their lives whose cycle is reversed compared to people in general will be discussed in this program.

programme.title: Night Guard S1
programme.desc: A family run business, Night Guard is a private security firm operating in Johannesburg, South Africa, where a violent crime happens every 16 seconds. Night Guard serves the people of Johannesburg by taking on the jobs that the police can't.

programme.title: Reality Trip
programme.desc: Follow five young adults as they leave their comfortable lifestyles behind to go on the Reality Trip of a lifetime! Travelling to Sri Lanka, Bangladesh and the Phillippines, the group learn the origins of their favourite brands. From working in cotton fields under a blazing sun, to sleeping on cardboard beds alongside the factory workers; this is a world they were not prepared for. Sparks fly between the group as stress and emotions take over.

programme.title: Discover London S2
programme.desc: Discover London uncovers hidden gems, guided by an experienced London Black Taxi driver and respected 'Knowledge of London' tutor, and a youthful Londoner seeking to learn more about her city. With almost every London street having a story behind it, there are surprising revelations along the way.

programme.title: Duo Backpackers
programme.desc: The journey of two travelers to magnificent hidden places across the islands of Indonesia.

programme.title: Side Walk
programme.desc: This program discusses the traditional food with its history, by bringing chefs from some restaurants / hotels that create innovations from the cuisine. Guided by a host who has experience and interest in the field of culinary specialities, Side Walk is an alternative entertainment program in the form of information on regional cuisine that has never been timeless.

programme.title: Tough Trains
programme.desc: Tough Trains takes viewers on some of the most epic and hard-core train journeys on the planet. Trips that should take hours often take days, and nights that should be spent in towns are spent aboard tough trains.

programme.title: The Longest Day
programme.desc: Climate change is more than a set of abstract projections and statistics. It's the daily reality for millions of people across the world, living on the frontlines of the climate crisis. The Longest Day is a snapshot of the climate crisis in action - told through the voices of farmers, health workers, city residents and displaced families.

programme.title: Duo Backpackers
programme.desc: The journey of two travelers to magnificent hidden places across the islands of Indonesia.

programme.title: Side Walk
programme.desc: This program discusses the traditional food with its history, by bringing chefs from some restaurants / hotels that create innovations from the cuisine. programme.desc: A religious program that preached by Abu Marlo. He is a former magician that currently become an Indonesian motivator.

programme.desc: Apart from being competitive, there are still many unique stories behind sports. The philosophy of sports club logos, to how much money is needed for a racing event, is discussed in this program.

programme.title: Why We Ride S2
programme.desc: Inspired by Audax Indonesia, this program uncovers the unique story and feelings of participant from 200 km to 600 km ride. Starting form the beginning ride, obstacles founded in the road, to the relieved feeling when arriving at the final point.

programme.desc: Indy Barends wants to share stories with his inspirational friends that can motivate people to be successful.

programme.title: Secret For A Healthy Life S2
programme.desc: A program that tells the inspiring story of a healthy life practitioner who has experienced a history of illness. He or she will share stories about their journey and also their secrets to fighting to heal or survive.

programme.desc: Inspires people to relate to the emotion of the moment. Captures the wellness of life and the excitement of doing a healthy lifestyle. Spread spirit and happiness. Wellness is related to local wisdom too.

programme.title: Animalpedia
programme.desc: A program for animal lovers. Everything you need to know about each animal that will be featured in this program.

programme.title: Vet Tales
programme.desc: Follow the daily ups and downs of two enthusiastic and entertaining New Zealand veterinarians - Dr Mark Young and Dr Stacey Tremain. These long-time friends graduated vet school together 20 years ago. Mark is now a rural vet working with large animals and Stacey works in a busy animal hospital dealing with smaller patients.

programme.title: Dr Lisa To The Rescue S1
programme.desc: Emergency vet Dr. Lisa Chimes ventures out of the surgery room to raise awareness about animal welfare in this compassionate pet rescue series. Lisa's mission is to encourage potential pet owners to adopt rescue animals from shelters rather than support puppy mills or backyard breeders.

programme.title: Bonding Buddy
programme.desc: The unusual closeness between humans and their pets is unique in itself.

programme.title: Sea Today Business (Live)
programme.desc: SEA Today Business delivers up to-date news and live reports about global stock markets.

programme.title: Coastal Life
programme.desc: Coastal communities are communities that generally make a living by utilizing the sea and its contents. The challenges of life facing the sea provide unique socio-economic characteristics to coastal communities. Coastal Life talks about the lives of coastal communities in Indonesia in general. The topics of each episode include culture, harsh life, livelihoods, problems often faced, and how they survive admist the offers of modernity.

programme.title: Exploring Nusantara With Kristian Hansen
programme.desc: Showcasing spectacular journey like you've never seen it before! Join with Kristian Hansen on non-stop journey one of Asia's most exotic and breath-taking nations Indonesia. Crossingmotorcycle journey from Sabang to Merauke to show you historic, cultural, people and insights alongside tantalising food and drinks, this show will inspire you and learn more about Indonesia.

programme.title: Global Business
programme.desc: The flagship business program of CGTNs English language service. The program offers in-depth analysis of the latest economic data, business trends and market moving policies, zooming in on how all this affects ordinary people. With separate editions out of Asia, Europe, Africa and the Americas, Global Business features analysts and news-makers supported through a global network of correspondents. Global Business shows you what's moving markets in both developed and emerging economies.

programme.title: Africa Live
programme.desc: Africa Live is a news program that focuses on African issues and issues related to this diverse continent. CGTNs Nairobi-based broadcast center produces Africa Live. Local correspondents and local production teams provide authoritative and in-depth stories from across the region. Africa Live is an objective and comprehensive look at every facet of African life.

Listening to the radio, these three heroines find their own ways of living overcoming hardships.

programme.title: The Slave Hunters - EP 5
programme.desc: Slaves fervently wishing to live like a human being VS. Slave hunters chasing them tirelessly. A bloody battle between them begins to take place!!! Being a slave hunter, Daegil is disregarded by people due to his low social status. While doing his job, Daegil is offered by Lee Gyongsuk to get Song Taeha and is promised to be given a fair amount of money as a reward. Taeha was forced to become a state slave as he was wrongfully accused of stealing some provisions.

programme.title: Big Boys Club
programme.desc: Each episode of Big Boys Club invites singers, artistes as well as people from different walks of life as guests onto the show, participating in relaxed interviews and discussing current trends.

programme.title: Of Greed And Ants - EP 12
programme.desc: The Hong Kong economy is booming in the 1970s. Wing Muk-tung aspires to be the master of the financial game as he approaches tycoon Tong Ho-fung. Ching Wing-chun and his buddies Chong Tai-hei and Luk Siu-fu also get involved.

programme.title: Anonymous Signal & What's On - EP 23
programme.desc: Three police rookies and a senior develop a tight relationship, until they part ways due to an operation. Mysterious text messages that can't be scientifically explained are being sent to them following a dismemberment murder of a young girl. Who sent them?

programme.title: Lo And Behold - EP 2535
programme.desc: Hung Shu-Kan owns a logistics business. The only thing on his mind is the well-being of his three daughters. His eldest daughter has moved abroad, but his second youngest daughter, Yuek-Shui, is still single. She and her little sister Sum-Yue often squabble, putting their father in a dilemma.

programme.title: Scoop 2025
programme.desc: This programme goes hot on the heels of the biggest happenings in society and the entertainment scene, bringing you the latest scoops.

programme.title: Gourmet Express
programme.desc: Hong Kong is home to gourmet food from all over the world. Our food anchors and hosts keep up with the latest foodie information and offers, gaining an in-depth understanding of the stories behind the taste.

programme.title: Choice Husband - EP 10
programme.desc: Shen Miao is the treasured daughter of the wealthiest merchant in Yangzhou City, but is not the luckiest when it comes to marriage. She gets involved in a twisted love tale between a talented scholar and rich glib.

programme.desc: A round-up of the news before the day ends.

programme.title: Global View
programme.desc: Bringing you the news from Hong Kong, the mainland and around the world every day.

programme.title: Secret Door - EP 5
programme.desc: Zhong Zi Kiu and Cheung Sam Yue are childhood friends who have taken very different paths due to crimes committed by their fathers. What will come of their encounter years later?

programme.title: My Sweet Mobster - EP 12
programme.desc: Ex-gangster Seo Ji Hwan (Um Tae Goo) runs a company hiring ex-gang members to help reform their lives. Go Eun-Ha (Han Sun Hwa), a children's YouTube creator, accidentally injures him while working a part-time cleaning job. To her surprise, he recognizes her!

programme.title: Brocade Odyssey - EP 25
programme.desc: The story tells of Ji Ying Ying (Tan Song Yun) from the Huahua Dyehouse during the Tang Dynasty. She bravely faces foreign invaders and guards her dyeing techniques. Later, she creatively spreads these methods overseas, becoming the Dyeing Ambassador of Tang.

programme.title: Lo And Behold - EP 1930
programme.desc: This story revolves around the Hung family, their working lives and friends, as well as the ghost that the family befriends!

programme.title: Call of Destiny - EP 7
programme.desc: Fang Ri Jin (Carlos Chan) unexpectedly connects with Xing Ke Lan (Hera Chan), who is in a future timeline and trapped in a crisis. Is fate already predetermined? Will Ri Jin choose to compromise, or will he take a leap of faith to rewrite destiny?

programme.title: Moonlight Mystique - EP 8
programme.desc: Bai Shuo (Bai Lu) unexpectedly saves the powerful demon god, Fan Yue (Ao Rui Peng) while on her journey to seek immortality. The duo gradually goes from manipulation to mutual affection, and take on a fantastic journey to vanquish demons and spirits.

programme.title: Home Troopers - EP 18
programme.desc: All through the years, LAI KA-KA (Liza Wang) has been looking after her family so well that both her husband CHU KOT HO (Ha Yu) and her eldest son CHU KOT CHING (Kevin Cheng) look up to her as their temporal and spiritual leader. As KA is utterly resolute in her belief that she has got the best plans for her family, CHING has secretly invested in a domestic cleaning agency without consulting her, over which they have a terrible quarrel.

programme.title: Working Women - EP 12
programme.desc: "Working Women" relates the fantastic love stories of four very different women: Jane(Kenix Kwok), Lan(Mui Siu Wai), Lam(Lau Kam Ling ) and Man(Kong Yan Yin). _x000D__x000D_Janes husband On(Cheung Kwok Keung) had an affair with a crazy woman who nearly killed Jane. Lans hushand Cheung(Harrison Gabriel), on the other hand, tried to murder Lan for her insurance. Lams husband Tin(Ngai Chun Kit) was so obsessed with Lam that he maltreated her.

programme.title: Righteous Fists, The - EP 16
programme.desc: Rewind to the 1930s and Bo Ching-wan (Ruco Chan) and his family have come to crime infested Tong Yan Street in Bangkok. His father Bo Tin-ha tragically dies after he has teamed up with Lin Chun-shan to rebel against Lo Heung-tung. Ching-wans younger brother and sister have also accidentally gone missing. His mother Ting Sai-fung (Yuen Qiu) has become emotionally unstable.

programme.title: LEGEND OF THE CONDOR HEROES (III) - EP 14
programme.desc: This costume Kung-fu packed serialized drama is an authenic adaptation of the most selling Kung -FU novel by the well renowned novelist KAM YUNG. This long series has been divided into 3 parts, each of these involved around individual story line and denotes a separate phase. Every part is complete in itself, yet, together they from a coherent whole.

programme.title: State Of Divinity - EP 2
programme.desc: Chung (Lui Chung Yin), senior student of the Wah Mount Sect, was not at all brilliant when he joined the Sect. However, he was taught to master the sword by a legendary swordsman Yeung. Chungs master, Kwan (Wong Wai), resented this and drove Chung away. In order to get hold of "Kwai Fa Bo Din", the book on the most powerful martial art, Kwan diverted others attention by secretly creating troubles everywhere. He was killed eventually.

programme.title: LEGEND OF THE CONDOR HEROES (III) - EP 15
programme.desc: TVBs across century billion-dollar production shows you the legend of a property giant._x000D__x000D_The property giant YIP WING TIM (Lo Ka Leung, Gallen) was born in the 60s in Hong Kong. His father, honest and righteous, was betrayed by his brother and put into prison. TIM, therefore, learned to be wise. He tried all means to take revenge and fortune seeking was always on top of his priorities.

programme.desc: All through the years, LAI KA-KA (Liza Wang) has been looking after her family so well that both her husband CHU KOT HO (Ha Yu) and her eldest son CHU KOT CHING (Kevin Cheng) look up to her as their temporal and spiritual leader. As KA is utterly resolute in her belief that she has got the best plans for her family, CHING has secretly invested in a domestic cleaning agency without consulting her, over which they have a terrible quarrel.

programme.title: Working Women - EP 13
programme.desc: "Working Women" relates the fantastic love stories of four very different women: Jane(Kenix Kwok), Lan(Mui Siu Wai), Lam(Lau Kam Ling ) and Man(Kong Yan Yin). _x000D__x000D_Janes husband On(Cheung Kwok Keung) had an affair with a crazy woman who nearly killed Jane. Lans hushand Cheung(Harrison Gabriel), on the other hand, tried to murder Lan for her insurance. Lams husband Tin(Ngai Chun Kit) was so obsessed with Lam that he maltreated her.

programme.title: Righteous Fists, The - EP 16
programme.desc: Rewind to the 1930s and Bo Ching-wan (Ruco Chan) and his family have come to crime infested Tong Yan Street in Bangkok. His father Bo Tin-ha tragically dies after he has teamed up with Lin Chun-shan to rebel against Lo Heung-tung. Ching-wans younger brother and sister have also accidentally gone missing. His mother Ting Sai-fung (Yuen Qiu) has become emotionally unstable.

programme.title: LEGEND OF THE CONDOR HEROES (III) - EP 15
programme.desc: TVBs across century billion-dollar production shows you the legend of a property giant._x000D__x000D_The property giant YIP WING TIM (Lo Ka Leung, Gallen) was born in the 60s in Hong Kong. His father, honest and righteous, was betrayed by his brother and put into prison. TIM, therefore, learned to be wise. He tried all means to take revenge and fortune seeking was always on top of his priorities.

programme.title: State Of Divinity - EP 4
programme.desc: Chung (Lui Chung Yin), senior student of the Wah Mount Sect, was not at all brilliant when he joined the Sect. However, he was taught to master the sword by a legendary swordsman Yeung. Chungs master, Kwan (Wong Wai), resented this and drove Chung away. In order to get hold of "Kwai Fa Bo Din", the book on the most powerful martial art, Kwan diverted others attention by secretly creating troubles everywhere. He was killed eventually.

programme.desc: Chung (Lui Chung Yin), senior student of the Wah Mount Sect, was not at all brilliant when he joined the Sect.
